segments.text: Sally , what do we have for dinner
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What would you like to have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I quit breakfast , so I had a rich brunch . I feel like having something mild for dinner
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , what about having some noodles ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Noodles are fine . Or maybe I'll have some porridge .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I'll cook for you .
segments.speaker: S2
